text:
you can use fetch command in cli
```hs fetch --account=<name> <src> [dest]```

Hello Dev team !

I have a question for the community if anyone come across the issue on macOS Catalina (10.15.7)

I have been getting this error while setting up new project using *hs init*

```[ERROR] A RequestError has occurred. Error: self signed certificate in certificate```
It was working just fine before my os got updated. Anyone is having similar issue or know any workaround on how do I fix this?

This does not auto create _HubSpot.config.yml_ file and then also not pulling the boilerplate as well.

Much appreciated the help.
does anyone know if I were to use github integration with HubSpot, what would be the destination path that I should write for files that reside in the design tools?
